output.dependency: The values in the column representing the source (airline or service) depend on the value in the column representing the flight identifier. Each source provides information for the same flight.
The values in the column representing the scheduled departure time have a dependency on the values in the column representing the actual departure time, indicating that they may not always match.
The values in the column representing the scheduled arrival time have a dependency on the values in the column representing the actual arrival time, indicating that they may not always match.
